\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Class that represents a UNIX domain address. 

This inherits from the UNIX form of a socket address, {\itshape sockaddr\+\_\+un}.

Checks if the address is set to some value. 

This doesn\textquotesingle{}t attempt to determine if the address is valid, simply that it\textquotesingle{}s a unix-\/family address with some name. \begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
{\itshape true} if the address has been set, {\itshape false} otherwise. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
